entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
